title: Plate, "Scene of Outer Space", ca. 1957
markings: Marks: On underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in orange overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular form; decorated with earth, stars, moon, and planets against a dark blue background; orbiting around the earth, a small red sphere (Sputnik); thin gilded band around outer edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Scene of Outer Space", ca. 1957.
ca. 1957. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-43.
